## SQLStatement class

SQLStatement is used with OpenRestDB to execute any sql-statement

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class SQLStatement 
```

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(connection)](./forms42core.sqlstatement._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>SQLStatement</code> class |

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [arrayfetch](./forms42core.sqlstatement.arrayfetch.md) |  | number | The number of rows to fetch from a select-statement per call to fetch |
|  [AutoDetectReurning](./forms42core.sqlstatement.autodetectreurning.md) | <code>static</code> | RegExp |  |
|  [columns](./forms42core.sqlstatement.columns.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string\[\] | The columns involved in a select statement |
|  [patch](./forms42core.sqlstatement.patch.md) |  | boolean | If the statement changes any values the backend |
|  [returnvalues](./forms42core.sqlstatement.returnvalues.md) |  | boolean | If used with sql-extension 'returning' |
|  [sql](./forms42core.sqlstatement.sql.md) |  | string | The sql-statement |
